participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

fitpo_wear.Description: Did you wear the Fitbit consistently?

fitpo_taken_off.Description: How often did you have to take the Fitbit off? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitpo_tech_issues.Description: How often did you have technical issues? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitpo_check_tracker.Description: How often did you check the Fitbit tracker? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitpo_use_apps.Description: How often did you use the app and/or website to see your Fitbit activity? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitpo_overnight_wear.Description: How often did you have to take the Fitbit off just before going to bed, or during the night? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitpo_sports.Description: How often did you have to take the Fitbit off during Sports? | 1= Never ; 2= Rarely ; 3= Sometimes ; 4= Often

fitbo_when_sport.Description: When: | 1=Weekends only ; 2=Weekdays only ; 3=Both weekends and weekdays; [fitpo_sports] > 1""

fitpo_experience.Description: My Fitbit experience was positive | 1=Strongly agree ; 2=Agree ; 3=Neither agree nor disagree ; 4=Disagree ; 5=Strongly disagree

fitpo_activity.Description: I changed my level of activity and/or sleep based on the information from the tracker | 1=Strongly agree ; 2=Agree ; 3=Neither agree nor disagree ; 4=Disagree ; 5=Strongly disagree

fitpo_longer_wear.Description: If asked, I would wear the Fitbit for longer | 1=Strongly agree ; 2=Agree ; 3=Neither agree nor disagree ; 4=Disagree ; 5=Strongly disagree

fitpo_own_tracker.Description: Have you got your own activity tracker that you use? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___1.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks: 1, were you in school | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___2.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks:  2, were you at home during the day? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___3.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks: 3, were you at camp (dat or overnight camp)? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___4.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks:  4, were you away on vacation? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___5.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks: 5, were you sick? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_past_3_weeks___6.Description: Please check the box for any of the following items that applied over the past 3 weeks: 6, were you in a different place from where you usually are? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_cv_situation.Description: Has your daily routine (I.e. things you typically do every day, at about the same time each day) changed due to the coronavirus situation? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_use_in_past_3_wks.Description: Which option below best describes your use of the Fitbit in the past 3 weeks? | 1=I wore the Fitbit more during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use ; 2=I wore the Fitbit the same during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use ; 3=I wore the Fitbit less during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use

Levels.1: I wore the Fitbit more during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use
Levels.2: I wore the Fitbit the same during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use
Levels.3: I wore the Fitbit less during the past 3 weeks compared to my first use

fitpo_sleep_time.Description: I have gone to sleep: | 1=more than 2 hours later than usual ; 2=1-2 hours later than usual ; 3=less than 1 hour later than usual ; 4=no change in bedtime ; 5=less than 1 hour earlier than usual ; 6=1-2 hours earlier than usual ; 7=more than 2 hours earlier than usual

Levels.1: more than 2 hours later than usual
Levels.3: less than 1 hour later than usual
Levels.5: less than 1 hour earlier than usual
Levels.7: more than 2 hours earlier than usual

fitpo_woken_up.Description: I have woken up: | 1=more than 2 hours later than usual ; 2=1-2 hours later than usual ; 3=less than 1 hour later than usual ; 4=no change in bedtime ; 5=less than 1 hour earlier than usual ; 6=1-2 hours earlier than usual ; 7=more than 2 hours earlier than usual

Levels.1: more than 2 hours later than usual
Levels.3: less than 1 hour later than usual
Levels.5: less than 1 hour earlier than usual
Levels.7: more than 2 hours earlier than usual

fitpo_sleeping.Description: I have been sleeping: | 1=much less than usual ; 2=less than usual ; 3=the same as usual ; 4=rather more than usual ; 5=much more than usual

fitpo_physical_activity.Description: I have been physically active: | 1=much less than usual ; 2=less than usual ; 3=the same as usual ; 4=rather more than usual ; 5=much more than usual

fitpo_how_phys_act___1.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 1, Walking | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___2.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)?  2, Bike ride | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___3.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 3, Work-out/aerobics | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___4.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 4, Yoga | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___5.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 6, Basketball | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___6.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 7, Scooter/skate-boarding | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___7.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 7, Scooter/skate-boarding | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___8.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 8, Swimming | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___9.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)?  9, Weight-lifting | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___10.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)?  10, Using exercise equipment (e.g. treadmill) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___11.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)? 11, Roller-skating/Roller-blading | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitpo_how_phys_act___12.Description: How are you getting physical activity? (select all that are applicable)?  12, Other | 0 = No; 1 = Yes
